articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Syrian President 
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on June 8.
					  The president said in the message he was very grateful to HE Kim Jong Un for sending warm congratulations to him on his reelection as president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and also the friendly Korean people progress and prosperity at all times.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin hosted a reception on Wednesday on the occasion of the national day of Russia. 
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Sim Kuk Ryong, general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of the missions of international organizations here. 
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were present there. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception. 
					
					 A reception was also given at the consulate general of Russia in Chongjin on the same day.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Trade Unions Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Trade Unions Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
 Hyesan, June 11 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the trade unions started the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A ceremony of kicking off the study tour took place before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Hyesan City on Wednesday.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 At the ceremony speakers said that the study tour should mark an important occasion of making officials and members of the trade unions harden their faith to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the monument before visiting the Ryanggang Provincial Revolutionary Museum, Hyesan Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery, etc.

articles.title: Foreign Sailors Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
articles.content:
Foreign Sailors Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
 Chongjin, June 11 (KCNA) -- There took place at Chongjin Port in North Hamgyong Province on June 11 a meeting to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The participants placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the mosaics depicting portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The captain and sailors of Kiribati-flagged ship HAO FAN 6 took part in the meeting.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The speakers said Kim Jong Il built the WPK into the Juche-type revolutionary party and the powerful guiding force of the Songun revolution through his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and energetic leadership for half a century.
					
					 They also said that the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses has been strengthened in the DPRK and great achievements made in the efforts to defend the socialist homeland and build a thriving nation.
					
					 They noted that as led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the WPK is ushering in a new heyday.
					
					 A letter to him was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK's Woman Gives Birth to 10th Child
articles.content:
DPRK's Woman Gives Birth to 10th Child
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Pak Kum Ok (44), living in Sogo-ri, Chonma County, North Phyongan Province, left the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital on June 10 after giving an easy birth to her 10th child on May 26.
					 Pak was awarded the title of Labor Hero with the 4th National Meeting of Mothers held in November Juche 101 (2012) as an occasion for giving birth to nine children. Speaking at the meeting, she vowed to give birth to more children, regarding it as an important work related with the existence of the nation, the patriotic one entrusted only to women.
					
					 Her baby weighed 3.78 kg at birth.
					
					 When leaving the hospital with her baby girl, Pak told KCNA:
					
					 It is natural for a woman to mother children, but the DPRK government called me to the national meeting of mothers and awarded me the title of Labor Hero for giving birth to many children.
					
					 Her husband Kang Chol Ho, a worker in Chonma County, said that the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) has been showing deep loving care to the living of those families with many children and he would reliably bring up his sons and daughters to live up to the loving care shown by the WPK.
					
					 Pak has borne Kang six sons and four daughters.
					
					 Their eldest son is in the Korean People's Army, while the eldest daughter working as a farmer.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Continues to Perform in Kanggye
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Continues to Perform in Kanggye 
 Kanggye, June 11 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus gave performances in Kanggye, Jagang Province on Tuesday and Wednesday. 
					 The performances were enjoyed by workers in the field of machine industry and other people, artistes and school youth and children in Kanggye and Manpho cities and Jonchon, Songgan, Janggang and Ryongrim counties. 
					
					 The performers made emotional representation of their ardent yearning for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who deeply trusted in the workers and aroused their mental power to lay a strong foundation of the great Paektusan nation during their leadership of the Korean revolution. Put on the stage were numbers such as orchestra and serial songs "Song in Praise of the Sun" and male chorus "Thanks to the Fatherly General". 
					
					 Male solo and male chorus "We Started from Scratch" and mixed duet and male chorus "Jagang Province Is the One My Country Boasts of" gave deep impression to the audience. The performances helped the audience recollect with pride the victorious path covered by the workers in Jagang Province who created a new history of the independent machine-building industry and made a breakthrough in the industrial revolution of the new century under the care of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The mood of the performances revved up as the performers gave male solo and male chorus "Party's Flag, Always Together with You" and mixed duet "The Voice of the Mother" which were newly represented on the spot. 
					
					 The performances ended with male chorus "Revolutionary Armed Forces Uphold Leadership of Marshal Only". 
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: River Improvements in Steady Progress in DPRK
articles.content:
River Improvements in Steady Progress in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has paid big efforts to river improvements.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Pang Song Gun, a deputy director of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection.
					
					 Pang said:
					
					 A series of downpour in recent years had claimed huge losses in the DPRK.
					
					 Now, the people throughout the country have improved at least 1 700km-long riverside in the spring period of the general mobilization for land management.
					
					 A number of dykes including those along the Taedong, Ryesong and Songchon rivers have been reconditioned as required by technical regulations.
					
					 North Hamgyong Province finished improving riversides along the Tuman River and Susong Stream. 75 hectares of riverbank were afforested and more than 50 hectares planted with turf along the Susong Stream.
					
					 Kangwon Province has nearly carried out the project to repair some dykes.
					
					 It took only five days in Pongsan County, North Hwanghae Province to dredge up 10,000 cubic meters of earth and pave with stone 1,500 square-meters of riverside stretching 7.5 kilometers in five rivers including the Sohung River.

articles.title: Cell Activator Injection Newly Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Cell Activator Injection Newly Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A cell activator injection, developed in the DPRK, is now winning popularity among inhabitants.
					 This patent injection, specially efficacious for liver functions, is a Koryo medicine made of extracts of such natural herbs as celandine, white poriacocos and Bupleurum falcatum.
					
					 According to Dr. So Ryong Won, section chief of the Korea General Red Cross Hospital, the medicine, a natural antioxidant, has no side effects on human body and helps proliferate cell with strong antiviral action and high ability of removing active oxygen.
					
					 Its developer O Yong Suk, a doctor of the Pongnam Polyclinic in Phyongchon District, Pyongyang, said the clinical study showed that the injection is very efficacious against fatty liver, chronic hepatitis, hepatitis B, and other liver diseases.
					
					 The injection also has a good effect on cardiovascular circulation disorders, arteriosclerosis hypertension, fatty pancreas, rheumatism and gastric ulcer.
					
					 Song Won Hyok, a Pyongyang citizen, said that the injection saved him from death by liver cirrhosis.
					
					 The cell activator injection was presented to the 17th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.

articles.title: Introduction of New Technologies Witnesses Increased Production in DPRK
articles.content:
Introduction of New Technologies Witnesses Increased Production in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Factories for agricultural field in the DPRK have introduced new technologies, thus increasing their production.
					 The gas purification workshop of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex replaced a smelting furnace with a modern one and updated its purification process, thus reducing the percentage of hydrogen sulfide in mixed gas to a fourth.
					
					 The casting workshop of the Kumsong Tractor Plant remodeled a low-frequency induction furnace into high-frequency one to improve the casting quality.
					
					 The Phyongwon Agricultural Chemicals Factory has developed new kinds of mixed insecticides suitable to soil conditions of the western coastal granaries of the country.
					
					 Such successes have been achieved by the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and the Haeju Trailing Farm Machine Factory.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Is Landmark for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Is Landmark for Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation is greeting the 14th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The joint declaration has given strong impetus to the movement for national reunification in the new century as an immortal landmark for hewing out the destiny of the nation and reunifying the country independently.
					
					 After the publication of the joint declaration, there arrived at the land of Korea once swept by the cold wind of division and confrontation a new era of independent reunification and the June 15 era of reunification where all Koreans advanced along the road of reunification, getting reconciled and united.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself, the basic spirit of the joint declaration, instilled the spirit of national independence into fellow countrymen and escalated the reunification movement into a nationwide movement comprising the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 The will for national cooperation aimed to reject outsiders and pool the efforts of Koreans under the banner of By Our Nation Itself was strikingly demonstrated in all places where they live.
					
					 As worship and flunkeyism towards the U.S. were rejected and consciousness of independence against the U.S. rapidly grew strong, the unreasonable intervention and obstructions of foreign forces met bitter condemnation by the whole nation.
					
					 Visits and contacts of organizations and compatriots of all social standings at home and abroad promoted reconciliation and unity and the movement for national reunification turned into a nationwide patriotic movement.
					
					 The formation of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration, a nationwide solidarity organization for reunification, helped further boost the solidarity and alliance among the north, the south and overseas sides and develop the movement for national reunification onto a new high stage.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself turned the north-south relations which had undergone a repeated vicious cycle of distrust and confrontation for more than half a century into relations of reconciliation, unity and cooperation. Through ministerial talks and other dialogues and contacts the north and the south discussed ways of implementing the joint declaration and developing the inter-Korean relations and put them into practice. The barrier of misunderstanding and distrust between the north and the south was pulled down, severed railways and roads were relinked and air and sea routes were opened, a stirring reality.
					
					 Wide-ranging cooperation and exchange for the development and prosperity common to the nation were conducted, bringing great joy to the Koreans.
					
					 Another historic Pyongyang summit was provided and the Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity was adopted in October 2007 when the inter-Korean relations and the reunification movement steadily developed along the road of independence, unity and cooperation.
					
					 The October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, was adopted, opening a rosy prospect for achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the reunification programmes common to the nation and its lifeline which the Koreans should invariably hold fast to in the movement for national reunification.
					
					 As proved by the past days, if the joint declarations are preserved and implemented, the way for the nation to live will open and reunification, peace and prosperity be achieved but if the declarations are abandoned, Koreans will suffer misfortune and war disasters.
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad should turn out in the drive to meet challenges of the anti-reunification forces, shatter their obstructive moves and implement the June 15 North-South Joint declaration.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Army-People Coordinated Operation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Army-People Coordinated Operation 
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The army-people coordinated operation is an effective work style of the DPRK where the leader and all the service personnel and people form a harmonious whole, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 From the beginning of the revolution the army and people of Korea held in high esteem President Kim Il Sung as the sun of the nation and weathered the stern tempest of history by their concerted efforts. 
					
					 The army-people coordinated operation launched amid the most arduous revolutionary struggle displayed its great vitality at every stage of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 The long course along which they created the spirit of defending the country and the legend of Chollima (flying horse) in the 1950s, worked the miracle of speed campaign and created the revolutionary soldier spirit and Kanggye spirit is associated with sweat and blood shed by all service personnel and people who remained true to the idea and leadership of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 In this course the army and people of the DPRK formed the strongest harmonious whole and the army-people coordinated operation serves as a peculiar work style and ever-victorious treasured sword of Songun Korea. 
					
					 The great era of Kim Jong Un is the era in which the army-people coordinated operation displays its might at the highest level as it leads the whole historic course of the Korean revolution to victory. 
					
					 All the service personnel and people have turned out in the drive to implement the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and uphold its policies. All work sites for building a thriving nation in order to realize the people's dreams and ideals are closely associated with their heroic feats. 
					
					 No force on earth can block Songun Korea where all its service personnel and people are dashing ahead in firm unity to implement the operational intention of Marshal Kim Jong Un, concludes the article.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Park Geun Hye met the former chairman of the UN "committee for investigation into human rights in the north" during his visit to south Korea. She blustered that the establishment of the UN "office for human rights in the north" provided an "epochal and fresh occasion for investigating the human rights performance in the north" and that "she would let the citizens in the south and the north know about the human rights record in the north."
					 Commentaries of papers Wednesday say that the Park group of traitors' decision to set up the "office" in south Korea is an unbearable insult to the social system of the dignified DPRK, another grave provocation aimed to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and an open declaration of a war against it.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun terms the decision an intolerable mockery of justice and truth, a blatant insult to the inviolable human rights and an unethical act of tarnishing the image of the UN.
					
					 The sinister aim sought by the south Korean authorities through the establishment of the "office" is to internationalize the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket and bring down the social system of the DPRK and its single-minded unity at any cost in collusion with foreign forces, the paper notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has already warned several times that the establishment of the "office" in south Korea is a grave hostile act of negating the social system in the DPRK and defaming its dignity. However, the puppet group is zealously pushing ahead with it. Herein lies the gravity of the situation.
					
					 The confrontation maniacs should stop their rash acts, pondering over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 Minju Joson warns that the DPRK will mercilessly punish those who are kicking up the human rights racket against the DPRK while hurting its dignity and social system.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Blasted for Appointing Diehard Confrontation Maniac as Chongwadae Security Office Chief
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Blasted for Appointing Diehard Confrontation Maniac as Chongwadae Security Office Chief
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye has recently appointed Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin as chief of the security office of Chongwadae.
					 As for traitor Kim, he is the worst trigger-happy element and confrontation maniac in the world.
					
					 This shows that she remains unchanged in her confrontation policy and what she pursues is to bring the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse and unleash a war against the north, says Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday  in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is crystal clear that the appointment of Kim as chief of the security office of Chongwadae will make the inter-Korean ties completely uncontrollable and increase the danger of a nuclear war against the north.
					
					 Park's such reckless actions not for dialogue and peace but for confrontation and war are nothing but the last-ditch efforts to tide over the catastrophic crisis.
					
					 Park is keen to bridge over the crisis by relying on Kim and ignite a war against the north. This is as foolish an act as precipitating her own self-destruction.
					
					 A wild ambition is bound to be accompanied by ruin.
					
					 It is the firm will of the DPRK to mercilessly frustrate the confrontation and war moves of the south Korean puppet regime and achieve the national reunification, the cherished desire of all Koreans.
					
					 The history of inter-Korean relations clearly shows what miserable end the group of traitors met while going reckless with acts of treachery and confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The Park group would be well advised to drop its foolish ambition to invade the north.

articles.title: South Koreans Hold Candlelight Rally for Probe into Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
South Koreans Hold Candlelight Rally for Probe into Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A candlelight rally took place at Chonggye Plaza in Seoul on June 7 under the sponsorship of the All-People Measure Council of Ferry Sewol Disaster comprising more than 800 civic and public organizations.
					 The speakers recalled that the Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident and the All-People Measure Council had collected one million signatures across south Korea in demand of the institution of a special law for the probe into the ferry Sewol disaster.  
					
					 They declared that they would carry on their actions till ten million signatures are collected.
					
					 They asserted that the unceasing great disasters are attributable to the "government's" policy of disregarding the lives of the people in pursuance of profits. They added that it is hard to expect the security of the people unless this policy is rolled back.
					
					 They continued: "We are still aboard the ferry Sewol. The 'government' is unbelievable. The people should come out to probe the truth by their own efforts."
					
					 The rally was followed by a demonstration.
					
					 Prior to the rally there was a ceremony of honoring the memory of the martyrs for democracy at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station.
					
					 The speakers accused the police of perpetrating such unethical act as defaming the dead body of the martyr who committed suicide in protest against the suppression of the trade unions and the plutocrats' harsh exploitation.
					
					 They declared that they would fight against the undemocratic, unpopular and anti-reunification forces to put an end to the reality in which the lives and safety of the workers are disregarded in pursuance of the interests of the businesses.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Resignation of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Resignation of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on June 7 said the June 4 elections to local self-governing bodies were a tribunal to mete out a stern judgment to the Park Geun Hye group.
					 The people enraged at the incompetence and irresponsibility for the ferry Sewol disaster and the deceptive act of making an apology and suppressing candlelight actions sternly judged the present regime in the elections, the editorial said.
					
					 Park has been pressurized to step down since she came to power due to the "government" bodies' illegal interference in the election and is now in the grip of the overall crisis in the political, military, economic, diplomatic and all other fields, it noted, adding:
					
					 Nevertheless, she, far from apologizing and probing the truth about the ferry sinking accident, resorted only to deceptive moves. So, she sustained a heavy defeat in face of the public resentment.
					
					 Park no more than a "vegetable president" should step down of her own accord, as demanded by the electors.
					
					 History shows what miserable end the successive dictators met while trying to stay in power by dint of dictatorship and suppression, going against the people's mindset. 
					
					 Park should draw a bitter lesson from her father who met his end, forsaken by the people.
					
					 What remains to be done by Park is to make a decision to step down.

articles.title: Set of Ceramic Vessels, Gift to Kim Jong Il from Ecuador
articles.content:
Set of Ceramic Vessels, Gift to Kim Jong Il from Ecuador
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- On display at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK is a set of ceramic vessels, a gift presented to leader Kim Jong Il by Humberto Ortiz Flores, general manager of Ecuador's "Voluntad" Publishing House, on February 16, Juche 70 (1981).
					 As an ardent follower of the Juche idea, the general manager prepared the gift to celebrate Kim Jong Il's birthday with his deep reverence.
					
					 The gift, consisting of 58 pieces of vessels mostly tinted with deep brown, includes two oval plates, 12 platters, 12 small plates, 6 cups, 6 wine-cups and 6 mats, one milk-cup, one cruet, two pepper jars, 6 small bowls and 4 cup mats.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Serbian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Serbian Political Party
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was posted on the website of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia on June 2.
					 The work, made public on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that it is the basic principle to be adhered to in accomplishing the socialist cause to preserve the Juche character and national character in the revolution and construction. It also indicates tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 It underscores the need to maintain the patriotic stand and the principle of national independence in the revolution and construction and indicates the tasks and ways for building the driving force and struggling against imperialism and dominationism.
					
					 Posted on the website was a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the preface the website said that he not only firmly defended the cause of socialism by comprehensively embodying the Juche idea and the Songun idea but made a breakthrough in achieving the prosperity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Khabarovsk, Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Khabarovsk, Russia
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A Khabarovsk territorial committee of Russia for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on June 5.
					 Alexander Fedosov, minister of Culture of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career of the President and his immortal exploits on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Egypt
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on June 5.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to praise the noble career of the President and his immortal exploits in the period between June 7 and July 8.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iran
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A committee of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Tehran on June 4.
					 Hamid Reza Taraghi, deputy general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career of the President and his exploits on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Held in Shenyang
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Held in Shenyang
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia show took place in Shenyang of China on June 5 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The venue of the show where more than 600 potted Kimjongilias, immortal flower, were on display against the background of miniature of Mt. Paektu presented fantastic scenery.
					
					 Present there were officials of the Shenyang City People's Government, personages of the Iris Palasii Cultivation Center in Shenyang and other personages and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were a delegation of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, DPRK consul general and staff members of the consulate general in Shenyang and others.
					
					 The manager of the cultivation center said that Kim Jong Il started work at the C.C., the WPK, firmly preserving leadership exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in the party-building and successfully carrying forward them. He noted that Kimjongilia will always be in full bloom in the minds of the peoples of China and Korea along with his exploits in party-building.
					
					 The manager of a company in Shenyang said that the exhibition being held in reflection of the reverence of the Chinese people for Kim Jong Il will mark an occasion of deepening the bonds of China-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The manager of another company in Shenyang said that the world famous flower Kimjongilia will be in full bloom not only in China but in the rest of the world, sincerely wishing the Korean people great successes in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Myanmar Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Myanmar Personages
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and a publishing house of Myanmar held meetings on May 29 and June 5 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the meetings were photos of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The acting secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the party said:
					
					 The WPK has covered the road of victory and glory and the DPRK proudly emerged a political, ideological and military power thanks to the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK could emerge victorious by meeting all challenges of hostile forces as it was led by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general manager of the publishing house said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted his all to strengthening the WPK, achieving the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people and accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 His exploits will be immortal.

articles.title: Dismantlement of "UN Command" Demanded by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Dismantlement of "UN Command" Demanded by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- In fact, the "UN Command" has nothing to do with the UN and is a mere fig leaf for covering the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on May 30.
					
					 The statement accused the U.S. forces side of its recent undesirable provocations at Panmunjom. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 All these provocations against the DPRK are serious violations of the security order and rules in the area of Panmunjom and the area along the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the U.S. forces side to deceive the world by creating the impression that the "UN Command" and the armistice mechanism are still functioning and invent a pretext for hurling even a single more country into the Korean front in contingency through such ridiculous charade.
					
					 The statement demanded the immediate disbandment of the "UN Command".

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Acts against DPRK Denounced by British Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Acts against DPRK Denounced by British Organization
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Britain-DPRK Friendship Association issued a statement on May 27 in denunciation of the hostile moves of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in the area of Panmunjom.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Panmunjom is not only a symbol of Korea's division but also the place which bears witness to the U.S. imperialists' defeat as the Armistice Agreement was concluded there.
					
					 We denounce the U.S. imperialists for trying to draw into the "UN Command" even Norway, Denmark and Italy which did not take part in the Korean War.
					
					 Such cunning move is an ulterior attempt to make another "international alliance" against the DPRK.
					
					 It was a vicious provocation that the U.S. set up a huge steel watchtower on a ridge in the area of the conference room at Panmunjom.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to stop the provocative acts against the DPRK at once.
					
					 We demand the U.S. dismantle the "UN Command" and withdraw all its aggressor forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el mensaje de respuesta que le remitiera el dia 8 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Agradezco de todo corazon a Su Excelencia por haberme felicitado cordialmente por mi reeleccion como presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					
					Hago sinceros votos por la buena salud y felicidad de Su Excelencia y por el progreso y prosperidad constantes del amistoso pueblo coreano.
					
					Expreso el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion a Su Excelencia Mariscal.

articles.title: Iniciado recorrido de funcionarios y gremiales de FGSC por zona del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Iniciado recorrido de funcionarios y gremiales de FGSC por zona del monte Paektu
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario del inicio (19 de Junio) del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, quedo iniciado el recorrido de los funcionarios y gremiales de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) a los lugares de batalla revolucionaria en la zona del monte Paektu.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 11 el acto de partida en la explanada frente al Monumento a la Victoria en la Batalla de Pochonbo, construido en la ciudad de Hyesan.
					
					Los participantes rindieron tributo al Generalisimo Kim Il Sung tras depositar cesto, ramos y ramitas de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en el monumento.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el recorrido de esta vez sera un motivo importante que hace a los funcionarios y gremiales de la FGSC tomar la firme decision de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, iniciada en el monte Paektu, bajo la direccion del Songun del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Terminado el acto, ellos recorrieron el monumento, el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de la Provincia de Ryanggang, el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios de Hyesan y otros lugares.

articles.title: Madre heroina Pak Kum Ok
articles.content:
Madre heroina Pak Kum Ok
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- La habitante de la comuna de Sogo del distrito de Chonma de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Pak Kum Ok (44 anos de edad), pario su decima hija en la Casa de Maternidad de Pyongyang y se dio de alta ayer.
					Con motivo de la IV Conferencia Nacional de Madres efectuada en noviembre del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche, ella recibio el titulo de Heroina del Trabajo por haber parido y criado a 9 hijos.
					
					Durante su intervencion en la conferencia, ella dijo que parir y educar bien a muchos hijos son cuestiones importantes que deciden el destino del pais y una tarea patriotica que pueden cumplir solo las mujeres.
					
					Su ultima hija nacida el 26 de mayo pesaba 3. 78kg al nacer.
					
					Los medicos de la Casa de Maternidad atendieron con devocion la salud de la mujer prolifica desde que ella ingresara en ese hospital el 8 de mayo.
					
					Pak dijo a la ACNC que fue demasiado honor para ella participar en dicha conferencia de madres y recibir el titulo de Heroina.
					
					Su esposo Kang Chol Ho, obrero de la empresa de movilizacion de materiales y fuentes del distrito de Chonma, senalo que los hijos de todas las madres del pais crecen bien en el regazo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Expuso su decision de formar a todos sus hijos como excelentes pilares del pais.
					
					La pareja tiene 6 hijos y 4 hijas. Actualmente, el primer hijo sirve en el Ejercito Popular de Corea y la primera hija es agricultora.

articles.title: Coro Estatal Benemerito ofrece funcion en Kanggye
articles.content:
Coro Estatal Benemerito ofrece funcion en Kanggye
Kanggye, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 10 y 11 en la ciudad de Kanggye de la provincia de Jagang la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito que realiza ahora una gira.
					  La presenciaron los obreros de maquinaria, los trabajadores, los artistas y los jovenes y escolares de las ciudades de Kanggye y Manpho y los distritos de Jonchon, Songgan, Janggang y Ryongrim.
					
					  La musica orquestal y cancion en serie "Himno al Sol", el coro masculino "Gracias, General padre" tradujeron la anoranza al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes en todo el proceso de su direccion sobre la revolucion coreana, confiaban firmemente en la clase obrera y prepararon la base solida de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					  El solo masculino y el coro masculino "Hemos comenzado de la nada" y el duo mixto y el coro masculino "La provincia de Jagang es un orgullo del pais" hacen recordar la trayectoria victoriosa de la clase obrera de dicha provincia que bajo la direccion de los grandes hombres sin pares, creo nueva historia de maquinaria independiente y abrio la brecha de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo.
					
					  La funcion llego al climax cuando se interpretaron el solo y coro masculinos "Siempre con la bandera del partido" y el duo mixto "Voz de madre".
					
					  La funcion termino con el coro masculino "Fuerzas armadas revolucionarias apoyan solo la guia del Mariscal".
					
					  La funcion continua.
